comment.author: 76016463@N00
36645048@N00
comment._content: French is on the right. He wears the star of the Grand Cross of the French Legion of Honour on his chest. The chap on the left is a staff officer. See the general's braid on French's cap and general's tabs on his collar.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you artolog for the information about Field Marshal French and thanks also to Heraldic Tyger for spotting the decorations and uniform details which identified him as the man on the right.
